name: Summer Hoop Workshops - Bristol
description:
MO' FLOW

A creative hoop dance workshop suitable for all levels. Using imagery and body focus to find flow with your dance. 

Saturday 17th August
DanceSpace (central Bristol)
2-4.30pm
£18

UPS AND DOWNS

Hoop dance workshop, moving the hoop further up and down the body. We'll use a variety of techniques to help you find your way into what many people find to be their 'hoop nemisis': leg and chest hooping, plus some of the bits in between. Please bring leg warmers and a blindfold. 

Sunday 18th August
DanceSpace (central Bristol)
2-4.30pm
£18

BOOK BOTH FOR JUST £28

Both workshops are with Emilie. 

Emilie has been hooping since 2009 and teaching since 2010. With an arts background she approaches hoop dance with her creativity, a passion for physiology a love of bass and rhythm. 

Over the years she has taught hundreds of hoopers of all shapes and sizes; from toddlers and teens to pensioners, the Metropolitan Police, burlesque dancers and bankers at Canary Wharf. She’s performed nationally at festivals and events including on stage at the O2. Emilie is a member of Equity and The Foundation for Community Dance.

name: Poly Propylene *POP* Travel Hoops
description:
Awesome - you're off adventuring!

Whether you're headed for the local park or to Hawaii, this is the hoop for you... 

These super lightweight clear hoops coil down for travel and join together securely with a pop fastening. Perfect for travelling, festivalling and getting around town. Fold down to a size you can get into hand luggage for most flights or wear as you wind your way through crowds.

Available in plain tubing with a inner ring of grip, partially taped in metallic and grip tape or fully fashioned in metallic tape with a grip interior.

Generally for hoopers who've been in the hoop for a while, or for those who naturally hoop more quickly.

Prices and options below.

Poly pro hoops are also available as solid rings (not collapsible) See 'Pretty poly hoops' section.

** CURRENTLY ON SPECIAL OFFER WITH FREE SHIPPING! **

options.name: Naked! (inner ring of grip tape optional - choose your colour by email)
Fully fashioned - covered in shiny tape with an optional inner ring of grip

name: Travel Hoops - figure 8 style
description:
Awesome - you're off adventuring!

Whether you're headed for the local park or to Hawaii, this is the hoop for you. They're a standard size hoop that can magically fold down to half normal diameter, perfect to sling over your shoulder. (In fact I once surprised a magician by producing a hula hoop from under a table in the middle of a field.)

Figure 8 style hoops fold down (kind of like a pop-up tent) and can easily be carried over your shoulder, in a canvas bag or in your hand luggage... Perfect for taking on your hooping holidays or for weaving through the crowds at a festival.

These are both the heavier kind of dance hoop, if you're looking for a fast, light travel hoop please have a look at the poly pro travel hoops.

Email us with your choice of colours of outfit dilemmas and we'll make it happen for you.

Sometimes we can rush orders through for those last minute holiday/festival emergencies, but generally hoops take up to 2 weeks to make.

** CURRENTLY ON SPECIAL OFFER WITH FREE SHIPPING! **

options.name: Thick hoop - 2 colours of gaffer tape
Thick hoop - 1 or 2 colours of gaffer plus 1 bling tape
Thin hoop - 2 colours of grip tape
Thin hoop - 1 or 2 colours of gaffer plus 1 bling tape

name: Pretty Poly (propylene) hoops
description:
Fast moving, responsive poly propylene hoops ideal for whizzy tricks. Generally preferred by those who've been hooping for a while, though I've seen the odd beginner find a perfect hoop-fit here too.

40" maximum diameter.

Thin tubing as standard - available solid or as travel hoops with a pop-fastening.

Designs - 

Naked (with 1 gaffer inside for grip)

Partially taped with 1 shiny tape and 1 gaffer.

Fully fashioned in pretty bling with a circle of gaffer inside for added grip.

Email hoops@thejoyofhooping with your colour preferences, a palette idea or word of the day if you'd like a surprise hoop.

POSTAGE: Is about £10 per hoop nowadays! We can offer you the following options:

£10 standard delivery charge
FREE postage on travel hoops
FREE collection from London, Bristol or Brighton.

options.name: NAKED TWINS! (pair of hoops up to 38")
NAKED MINIS (pair of hoops up to 30")

name: Pink and grey beginner's practice hoop
description: Nice and grippy with grey and UV reactive neon pink tapes on a 42" beginner hoop (suitable for taller hoopers or those who feel more comfortable with a slower hoop).

name: Super hoop - beginner
description:
40" super hoop - colours inspired by superheroes, think wonderwoman and superman when you get this hoop on and BE AMAZING!

Suitable for absolute beginners.

Hoops can be custom made to enhance your particular super power/hero worship needs.

Email thejoyofhooping@gmail.com to talk designs...

name: Classic gold, black, white striped beginner hoop
description: Beautiful 40" beginner hoop with gold mirror tape, black and white stripes of super grip tape.

name: Gift Vouchers
description:
Gift vouchers available in £5, £10 and £20 denominations - they can be used to buy all manner of FUN... classes, hoops, workshops, books, DVDs or even used as payment for a hoop dance party!

Available as a physical voucher with a code to use online or in person.

Visit www.thejoyofhooping.com for more info on classes, workshops and events or browse the web shop here to see what else is on offer.

Valid for 6 months from date of purchase. Vouchers cannot be exchanged for cash - any change due would be given as credit or vouchers.

IDEAS!

£5 will gift 
* a squidgy hoop - suitable for kids or for hand hooping

£15 will gift
* 'Hooping' book/DVD by Christabel "HoopGirl" Zamor
* 'Hoopdance for Beginners' DVD

£20 will gift
* A super shiny custom made fitness hoop

£35 will gift 
* a 6 week course (or)
* a super shiny fitness hoop & 'Hooping' book/DVD (or)
* a practice hoop & a squidgy hoop & 'Hooping' book/DVD & a bit left over : )

£80 will gift
* The Beginners complete package - 12 weeks of classes, a 2 colour shiny beginner hoop (made to order) and a squidgie hoop.

name: *BLING* adult dance hula hoops for maximum pleasure
description:
Handmade to order these hoops shine.

Choose your favourite colurs - remember the hoop will spin and colours may blend a little in motion.

The bling tapes come in a range of finished, glitter, holographic glitter, prismatic, jelly, mirrored and more.

Get creative with colour ideas or get in touch if you'd like help.

2 colours striped (e.g. grip black with shiny gold or glitter purple with blue grip)

3 colours - striped (choose 2 grip tapes and 1 shiny tape)

4 colours - These hoops are taped in different directions to create a woven effect

Pulse hoops - Choose 1 or 2 shiny tapes and 2 grip tapes. These hoops appear to *pulse* with colour as you hoop.

POSTAGE: Is about £10 per hoop nowadays! We can offer you the following options:

£10 standard delivery charge
FREE postage on travel hoops
FREE collection from London, Bristol or Brighton.

name: SUPERGRIP! Hip Loving Hoops.
description:
These handmade hoops are covered in stripes of high quality grip tape, you chose the colours and your hoop will be made to order.

Available in 25mm (approx. 650g) or 20mm tubing (approx. 500g).

Maximum 3 colours.

Have a look at the pics for some examples.

Email hoops{@}thejoyofhooping with your colour choice or if you have any questions.

POSTAGE: Is about £10 per hoop nowadays! We can offer you the following options:

£10 standard delivery charge
FREE postage on travel hoops
FREE collection from London, Bristol or Brighton.

name: Squidgies
description:
These hoops are pre-formed out of a softer plastic which makes them ideal for hand hooping, twin/poi hoop work and kids.

Standard come in Red, Green, Blue or Yellow coloured plastic.

Grip - add 1 or 2 colours of tape for extra grip

*Bling* - give it some glitter!

POSTAGE: Is about £10 per hoop nowadays! We can offer you the following options:

£10 standard delivery charge
FREE postage on travel hoops
FREE collection from London, Bristol or Brighton.

name: Hoopdance for Beginners DVD
description: Christabel 'HoopGirl' Zamor DVD with a good range of beginner moves, explained beautifully for the newcomer to the hoop. A great introduction for those who can't make it to classes or as a reminder for practicing at home.

name: Hooping: A Revolutionary Fitness Program (Book & DVD)
description:
Christabel Zamor (HoopGirl) has written this great book giving you a history of hooping, interesting info on the benefits of hoop dance, a step by step guide to a range or hoop moves and it's accompanied by a DVD.

£12.99 R.R.P
